page.title: 19The Environment.
page.content: Most of our block is farming countryside.The farmers conserve nature by laying A-shaped hedges. Almost all of the work is mechanised,this saves time,labour, and money.However a few farmers prefer to live in the past.Most of the farms are owner occupied, few of them employ outside labour.Apart from around Stainforth Pit,the waterways are clean and the fish are healthly.The buildings around the pit suffer from coal dust fall out,and smell.People living within 2 miles of the pit can hear machine noises.The roads within Stainforth unfortunately have litter scattered about.There is a lot of wildlife in our block.Most of the land in our block is unpolluted.
